name: Herbolary
description: A locale steeped in arcane or spiritual power; adventurers may study spells, brew potions, or face eldritch hazards.
atmosphere: The establishment is filled with the earthy scent of medicinal herbs and the subtle tang of healing magic. The air carries the promise of natural remedies and the mysteries of botanical medicine, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of ancient healing traditions and the power of nature's pharmacy.
